intent_atoms.description: Execute the random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware once Combine support is available to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads.
Benchmark results must show comparable throughput between mapped and chunked readers when run on macOS with Combine support.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate the end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow.
All tests in ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests must pass, confirming correct SwiftUI automation behavior.
Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with the CLI harness.
Latency metrics collected on macOS must be within acceptable thresholds and throughput must match CLI harness results.
Combine support is required for all macOS benchmark and UI testing tasks; without it, tasks are blocked.
Apple Events automation will be evaluated for notarized builds to determine if entitlements can be safely extended.
Draft README feature matrix and screenshots as part of the documentation readiness effort.
